verses.verse: ( The Beginning) ( ( 10 1:1-2 ; 650 11:1-3 )) Ἐν <WG1722> En In ἀρχῇ <WG746> archē [the] beginning ἦν <WG1510> ēn was ὁ <WG3588> ho the Λόγος <WG3056> Logos Word , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ὁ <WG3588> ho the Λόγος <WG3056> Logos Word ἦν <WG1510> ēn was πρὸς <WG4314> pros with τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεόν <WG2316> Theon God , καὶ <WG2532> kai and Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God . ἦν <WG1510> ēn was ὁ <WG3588> ho the Λόγος <WG3056> Logos Word
Οὗτος <WG3778> Houtos He ἦν <WG1510> ēn was ἐν <WG1722> en in ἀρχῇ <WG746> archē [the] beginning . πρὸς <WG4314> pros with τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεόν <WG2316> Theon God

πάντα <WG3956> panta all things δι’ <WG1223> di’ Through αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him ἐγένετο <WG1096> egeneto were made , καὶ <WG2532> kai and χωρὶς <WG5565> chōris without αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him ἐγένετο <WG1096> egeneto was made οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude nothing ἕν <WG1520> hen . . . ὃ <WG3739> ho that γέγονεν <WG1096> gegonen has been made .

ἐν <WG1722> en In αὐτῷ <WG846> autō Him ζωὴ <WG2222> zōē life , ἦν <WG1510> ēn was καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡ <WG3588> hē [that] ζωὴ <WG2222> zōē life ἦν <WG1510> ēn was τὸ <WG3588> to the φῶς <WG5457> phōs light τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἀνθρώπων <WG444> anthrōpōn of men .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὸ <WG3588> to The φῶς <WG5457> phōs Light ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē the σκοτίᾳ <WG4653> skotia darkness , φαίνει <WG5316> phainei shines καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡ <WG3588> hē the σκοτία <WG4653> skotia darkness αὐτὸ <WG846> auto it . οὐ <WG3756> ou has not κατέλαβεν <WG2638> katelaben overcome ( Or comprehended)

( The Witness of John) Ἐγένετο <WG1096> Egeneto There came ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos a man ἀπεσταλμένος <WG649> apestalmenos who was sent παρὰ <WG3844> para from Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God . ὄνομα <WG3686> onoma name αὐτῷ <WG846> autō His Ἰωάννης <WG2491> Iōannēs [was] John .

οὗτος <WG3778> houtos He ἦλθεν <WG2064> ēlthen came εἰς <WG1519> eis as μαρτυρίαν <WG3141> martyrian a witness ἵνα <WG2443> hina to μαρτυρήσῃ <WG3140> martyrēsē testify περὶ <WG4012> peri about τοῦ <WG3588> tou the φωτός <WG5457> phōtos Light , ἵνα <WG2443> hina so that πάντες <WG3956> pantes everyone πιστεύσωσιν <WG4100> pisteusōsin might believe . δι’ <WG1223> di’ through αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou him

οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not ἦν <WG1510> ēn was ἐκεῖνος <WG1565> ekeinos He himself τὸ <WG3588> to the φῶς <WG5457> phōs Light , ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but ἵνα <WG2443> hina - μαρτυρήσῃ <WG3140> martyrēsē he came to testify περὶ <WG4012> peri about τοῦ <WG3588> tou the φωτός <WG5457> phōtos Light .

Ἦν <WG1510> Ēn was τὸ <WG3588> to The φῶς <WG5457> phōs Light τὸ <WG3588> to - ἀληθινὸν <WG228> alēthinon true ὃ <WG3739> ho who φωτίζει <WG5461> phōtizei gives light to πάντα <WG3956> panta every ἄνθρωπον <WG444> anthrōpon man ἐρχόμενον <WG2064> erchomenon coming εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόσμον <WG2889> kosmon world .

ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the κόσμῳ <WG2889> kosmō world , ἦν <WG1510> ēn He was καὶ <WG2532> kai and [though] ὁ <WG3588> ho the κόσμος <WG2889> kosmos world δι’ <WG1223> di’ through αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him , ἐγένετο <WG1096> egeneto was made καὶ <WG2532> kai - ὁ <WG3588> ho the κόσμος <WG2889> kosmos world αὐτὸν <WG846> auton Him . οὐκ <WG3756> ouk did not ἔγνω <WG1097> egnō recognize

ὅσοι <WG3745> hosoi all who δὲ <WG1161> de But ἔλαβον <WG2983> elabon did receive αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him , ἔδωκεν <WG1325> edōken He gave αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to ἐξουσίαν <WG1849> exousian the right τέκνα <WG5043> tekna children Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God — γενέσθαι <WG1096> genesthai to become τοῖς <WG3588> tois to those πιστεύουσιν <WG4100> pisteuousin who believed εἰς <WG1519> eis in τὸ <WG3588> to - ὄνομα <WG3686> onoma name , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His

οἳ <WG3739> hoi [children born] οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not ἐξ <WG1537> ex of αἱμάτων <WG129> haimatōn blood , οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude nor ἐκ <WG1537> ek of θελήματος <WG2307> thelēmatos [the] desire σαρκὸς <WG4561> sarkos . . . οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude [or] ἐκ <WG1537> ek - θελήματος <WG2307> thelēmatos will ἀνδρὸς <WG435> andros of man , ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ but ἐκ <WG1537> ek of Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God . ἐγεννήθησαν <WG1080> egennēthēsan born

( The Word Became Flesh) ( ( 230 84:1-12 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ὁ <WG3588> ho The Λόγος <WG3056> Logos Word σὰρξ <WG4561> sarx flesh ἐγένετο <WG1096> egeneto became καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐσκήνωσεν <WG4637> eskēnōsen made His dwelling ἐν <WG1722> en among ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin us . ( Or and tabernacled among us) καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐθεασάμεθα <WG2300> etheasametha We have seen τὴν <WG3588> tēn - δόξαν <WG1391> doxan glory , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His δόξαν <WG1391> doxan [the] glory ὡς <WG5613> hōs of μονογενοῦς <WG3439> monogenous [the] one and only [Son] ( Or the Only Begotten or the Unique One) παρὰ <WG3844> para from Πατρός <WG3962> Patros [the] Father , πλήρης <WG4134> plērēs full χάριτος <WG5485> charitos of grace καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀληθείας <WG225> alētheias truth .

Ἰωάννης <WG2491> Iōannēs John μαρτυρεῖ <WG3140> martyrei testified περὶ <WG4012> peri concerning αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him . καὶ <WG2532> kai - κέκραγεν <WG2896> kekragen He cried out , λέγων <WG3004> legōn saying , Οὗτος <WG3778> Houtos “ This ἦν <WG1510> ēn is He ὃν <WG3739> hon of whom εἶπον <WG2036> eipon I said , Ὁ <WG3588> Ho ‘ He who ὀπίσω <WG3694> opisō after μου <WG1473> mou me ἐρχόμενος <WG2064> erchomenos comes ἔμπροσθέν <WG1715> emprosthen surpassed μου <WG1473> mou me γέγονεν <WG1096> gegonen has ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because πρῶτός <WG4413> prōtos before μου <WG1473> mou me .’ ” ἦν <WG1510> ēn He was

Ὅτι <WG3754> Hoti - ἐκ <WG1537> ek From τοῦ <WG3588> tou - πληρώματος <WG4138> plērōmatos fullness αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His ἡμεῖς <WG1473> hēmeis we πάντες <WG3956> pantes have all ἐλάβομεν <WG2983> elabomen received καὶ <WG2532> kai - χάριν <WG5485> charin grace ἀντὶ <WG473> anti upon χάριτος <WG5485> charitos grace .

ὅτι <WG3754> hoti For ὁ <WG3588> ho the νόμος <WG3551> nomos law διὰ <WG1223> dia through Μωϋσέως <WG3475> Mōuseōs Moses ; ἐδόθη <WG1325> edothē was given ἡ <WG3588> hē - χάρις <WG5485> charis grace καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡ <WG3588> hē - ἀλήθεια <WG225> alētheia truth διὰ <WG1223> dia through Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ . ἐγένετο <WG1096> egeneto came

Θεὸν <WG2316> Theon God , οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis No one ἑώρακεν <WG3708> heōraken has ever seen πώποτε <WG4455> pōpote . . . μονογενὴς <WG3439> monogenēs [but] the one and only Son , Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos [who is Himself] God ὁ <WG3588> ho [and] ( Or but the only begotten God, who; BYZ and TR but the only begotten Son, who) ὢν <WG1510> ōn is εἰς <WG1519> eis at τὸν <WG3588> ton the κόλπον <WG2859> kolpon side , ( Greek in the Father’s bosom) τοῦ <WG3588> tou vvv Πατρὸς <WG3962> Patros Father’s ἐκεῖνος <WG1565> ekeinos - ἐξηγήσατο <WG1834> exēgēsato has made [Him] known .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ὡμολόγησεν <WG3670> hōmologēsen He did not refuse to confess καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . οὐκ <WG3756> ouk . . . ἠρνήσατο <WG720> ērnēsato . . . , καὶ <WG2532> kai but ὡμολόγησεν <WG3670> hōmologēsen openly declared ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - , Ἐγὼ <WG1473> Egō “ I οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not εἰμὶ <WG1510> eimi am ὁ <WG3588> ho the Χριστός <WG5547> Christos Christ . ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἠρώτησαν <WG2065> ērōtēsan they inquired αὐτόν <WG846> auton . . . . Τί <WG5101> Ti who [are you] ? ” οὖν <WG3767> oun “ Then σὺ <WG4771> sy you Ἠλίας <WG2243> Ēlias Elijah ? ” εἶ <WG1510> ei “ Are Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - λέγει <WG3004> legei He said , Οὐκ <WG3756> Ouk not . ” εἰμί <WG1510> eimi “ I am Ὁ <WG3588> Ho the προφήτης <WG4396> prophētēs Prophet ? ” εἶ <WG1510> ei “ Are σύ <WG4771> sy you Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἀπεκρίθη <WG611> apekrithē He answered , Οὔ <WG3756> Ou “ No . ”

Εἶπαν <WG2036> Eipan they said οὖν <WG3767> oun So αὐτῷ <WG846> autō to him , Τίς <WG5101> Tis “ Who εἶ <WG1510> ei are you ? ἵνα <WG2443> hina vvv ἀπόκρισιν <WG612> apokrisin an answer δῶμεν <WG1325> dōmen We need τοῖς <WG3588> tois for those πέμψασιν <WG3992> pempsasin who sent ἡμᾶς <WG1473> hēmas us . τί <WG5101> ti What λέγεις <WG3004> legeis do you say περὶ <WG4012> peri about σεαυτοῦ <WG4572> seautou yourself ? ”

Ἔφη <WG5346> Ephē [John] replied Ἐγὼ <WG1473> Egō “ I [am] φωνὴ <WG5456> phōnē a voice βοῶντος <WG994> boōntos of one calling ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē the ἐρήμῳ <WG2048> erēmō wilderness , Εὐθύνατε <WG2116> Euthynate ‘ Make straight τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ὁδὸν <WG3598> hodon way Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou for [the] Lord .’” ( (see also LXX)) καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs in εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen the words of Ἠσαΐας <WG2268> Ēsaias Isaiah ὁ <WG3588> ho the προφήτης <WG4396> prophētēs prophet :
Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then ἀπεσταλμένοι <WG649> apestalmenoi who had been sent ἦσαν <WG1510> ēsan . . . ἐκ <WG1537> ek . . . τῶν <WG3588> tōn the Φαρισαίων <WG5330> Pharisaiōn Pharisees

Ἀπεκρίθη <WG611> Apekrithē replied αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois . . . ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰωάννης <WG2491> Iōannēs John λέγων <WG3004> legōn . . . , Ἐγὼ <WG1473> Egō “ I βαπτίζω <WG907> baptizō baptize ἐν <WG1722> en with ( Or in; also in verse 31 and twice in 33) ὕδατι <WG5204> hydati water , ” μέσος <WG3319> mesos “ but among ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you ἕστηκεν* <WG2476> hestēken stands ὃν <WG3739> hon [One] ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you οὐκ <WG3756> ouk do not οἴδατε <WG1492> oidate know .

ὁ <WG3588> ho [He is] the One who ὀπίσω <WG3694> opisō after μου <WG1473> mou me , ἐρχόμενος <WG2064> erchomenos comes οὗ <WG3739> hou of whose οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not εἰμὶ <WG1510> eimi am ἐγὼ <WG1473> egō I ἄξιος <WG514> axios worthy ἵνα <WG2443> hina to λύσω <WG3089> lysō untie . ” αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou - τὸν <WG3588> ton the ἱμάντα <WG2438> himanta straps τοῦ <WG3588> tou - ὑποδήματος <WG5266> hypodēmatos sandals

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then ἐμαρτύρησεν <WG3140> emartyrēsen testified Ἰωάννης <WG2491> Iōannēs John λέγων <WG3004> legōn . . . , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - Τεθέαμαι <WG2300> Tetheamai “ I saw τὸ <WG3588> to the Πνεῦμα <WG4151> Pneuma Spirit καταβαῖνον <WG2597> katabainon descending ὡς <WG5613> hōs like περιστερὰν <WG4058> peristeran a dove ἐξ <WG1537> ex from οὐρανοῦ <WG3772> ouranou heaven καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔμεινεν <WG3306> emeinen resting ἐπ’ <WG1909> ep’ on αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him .
